Name: Minty White Lady cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.
Review: White crème de menthe and peppermint bitters bring minty freshness to this lady in white.
History: A minty riff on the classic White Lady created by yours truly in August 2015 at the Cabinet Room in London, England. White Lady cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Minty White Lady cocktail contains 187 calories
